meanings.definition: A person who browns or tans their skin.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a browners and loves spending time in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The beach is full of browners enjoying the warm weather.
meanings.sent3: The browners at the pool always have the perfect tan.
meanings.sent4: She became a browners after her tropical vacation.
meanings.sent5: The browners' skin glowed with a golden hue.

meanings.definition: A device used for browning food.
meanings.sent1: The browners in the kitchen made the chicken crispy and delicious.
meanings.sent2: The chef used the browners to give the dish a nice crust.
meanings.sent3: The browners in the oven worked like magic on the bread.
meanings.sent4: The browners evenly cooked the top of the casserole.
meanings.sent5: The browners added a perfect touch to the dessert.

meanings.sent1: The browners of the meat gave it a rich flavor.
meanings.sent2: She watched the browners of the onions in the pan.
meanings.sent3: The browners of the toast filled the kitchen with a toasty aroma.
meanings.sent4: The browners of the sugar created a caramelized glaze.
meanings.sent5: The browners of the butter added a golden hue to the sauce.
